questions.text: Does your headache occur primarily on one side of your head?
Do you see flashing lights or other visual disturbances before your headache starts?
Do your headaches get worse with physical activity or movement?
Do you have a high fever along with your headache?
Does bending your neck forward increase your headache pain?
Have you recently been in contact with someone with a confirmed case of meningitis?
Are you coughing up colored (yellow, green, or bloody) mucus?
Do you have sharp chest pain that worsens when you breathe deeply or cough?
Have you had a high fever (above 38.5°C or 101.3°F) for more than two days?
Do you have crushing or squeezing pain in the center of your chest lasting more than a few minutes?
Does your chest pain radiate to your jaw, left arm, or back?
Are you experiencing cold sweats or sudden dizziness along with chest discomfort?
Have you recently experienced a blow to the head or other head trauma?
Are you having difficulty concentrating or remembering things since your headache began?
Do bright lights or loud sounds make your headache significantly worse?
Did your symptoms come on suddenly and severely over the course of a day?
Are you experiencing body aches or muscle pain throughout your body?
Have you been in contact with someone who has the flu in the past week?
Have you noticed a circular, expanding rash that resembles a bullseye?
Have you been in wooded or grassy areas and potentially been exposed to ticks in the past 30 days?
Are your joint pains migratory, moving from one joint to another over time?
Have you lost your sense of taste or smell?
Have you been in contact with someone who tested positive for COVID-19 in the past 14 days?
Are you experiencing unusual fatigue that is out of proportion to your other symptoms?
Do you have a history of asthma or allergic conditions?
Do you hear a whistling or wheezing sound when you breathe out?
Do your breathing problems worsen at night or early morning?
Do your joint symptoms include swelling, warmth, and morning stiffness lasting more than an hour?
Are the same joints affected on both sides of your body (symmetrical pattern)?
Have you experienced joint pain and stiffness for more than six weeks?
